constructor.details: Constructor - sets up the contract. The deployer is automatically set as the owner.

params._initialSubmissionFee: Fee required to submit a score (in wei).
params._maxLeaderboardSize: The maximum number of entries in the leaderboard.

getLeaderboard(uint256).details: Returns the top N scores from the leaderboard.

params._topN: The number of top scores to retrieve.

getLeaderboardSize().details: Returns the current size of the leaderboard.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pauses the contract, preventing new score submissions. (Owner only)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

submitScore(string,uint256).details: Submits a new score to the leaderboard.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Unpauses the contract, allowing new score submissions. (Owner only)

upgradeContract(address).details: Emits an event indicating a contract upgrade.

params._newContract: The address of the new contract.

withdrawFees(address).details: Withdraws accumulated fees to a specified address. (Owner only)

params._to: The address to send the fees to.

upgradeContract(address).notice: This function is for signaling off-chain systems about a new contract address.         It does NOT perform an on-chain upgrade (e.g., via a proxy).

version().notice: Returns the version of the contract.
